Class FilterFragment

com.example.househomey.filter.ui.FilterFragment

Direct Known Subclasses:
DateFilterFragment, KeywordFilterFragment, MakeFilterFragment, TagFilterFragment
public abstract class FilterFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment
Abstract class for creating filter fragments.

    • getFilterInput

      public abstract void getFilterInput()
      These methods should be implemented in subclasses to define filter-specific logic e.g. date, make, keywords, and tag filters.
